title: Petit Yuri Hime
description:
A special booklet that came with Yuri Hime 11. Most are mini-sequels to stories from Yuri Hime, Yuri Hime S, and Yuri Hime Wildrose.
[spoiler]
1. First Love Sisters (Hatsukoi Shimai) extra by Shinonome Mizuo is a version of Alice in Wonderland.

2. Hatsumoude Syndrome: In an extra in Kazuma Kowo's Pure Water Adolescence series, Nanao and Matsumoto celebrate the New Year.

3. Creo the Crimson Crises extra by Takewakemaru

4. Aoi Shiro 4-panel strips by Edoya Pochi

5. Getting Cozy: A group of 4-panel comics based on Morishima Akiko's The Conditions For Paradise (Rakuen no Jouken) collection.

6. Nanami and Misuzu extra by Minakata Sunao, featuring New Year's-related gags.

7. Apple Day Dream 2 by Jounouchi Nene is about how hard it is for Yuma and Kaoru to be apart. The first chapter's published in Sayuri-Hime 2.

8. Watermelon Sacchan by Yoshitomi Akihito is a mini-sequel to Suika from Nettai Shoujo. Rin buys Sacchan a watermelon.

9. Cassiopeia Dolchu by Takagi Nobuyuki is a short in the Cassiopeia Dolce series from Yuri Hime S.

10. The First Smile of the New Year: original by Mizuki Maya. A girl tries to make her friend smile.

11. The Vice President's Fortune by Hakamada Mera is a short of the "Kaichou to Fukukaichou" series from Comic Yuri Hime S.

12.  A Maiden's Heart is a few 4-panel strips about Iwami Shouko's Yuri Hime S series flower*flower.

13. The Maidens' Salon is a few 4-panel strips about Sudoo Kaoru's Yuri Hime S series Otome -Kikan Gretel.

14. Girls Don't Cry: Ritsuko gets a shock --one of her friends thinks Sayo is cool! A mini-sequel to Sweet Little Devil (Nanzaki Iku) from Yuri Hime Wildrose' first volume and Heart and Soul from second volume.

15. Image Change: Izawa thinks Yoshikawa could use an image change. A mini-sequel to Blue (Hayase Hashiba) from Yuri Hime Wildrose  

16. The Greenhouse New Year's Dream: Saki's first dream of the new year is naughty. A mini-sequel to The Greenhouse Witch and The Greenhouse Secret by Mikuni Hajime (Yuri Hime Wildrose)

17.  Hao! extra: Haoran takes offense at a dictionary's definition of a particular term. A mini-sequel to "Hao!", by Chi-Ran, that appears in the first volume of Yuri Hime Wildrose.

18. The Bridal Squabble by Tokitsukaze Otoha is a mini-sequel to "Ichiban Suki na Hito" from Yuri Hime Wildrose. Rinko and Ai fight over who gets to be the bride.
[/spoiler]
